title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 178.7 - Accounting standards
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 178.7 - Accounting standards

State Regulations

An insurer shall account for and report derivative transactions in statements filed pursuant to sections
307 (a)
and
308 (b)
of the Insurance Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 11
ยง
178.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
